emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '250 g fresh pasta' to 'pasta, raw' as it is the least processed option available for fresh pasta.
Matched '1 onion' to 'onion, raw' as it is the least processed option available for onions.
Matched '1 bunch of green asparagus' to 'asparagus, green, raw' as it is the least processed option available for green asparagus.
Matched '1 squash' to 'squash, raw' as it is the least processed option available for squash.
Matched '2 dl cream' to 'cream, whipping, 38 % fat' as it is the least processed option available for cream.
Matched '1 dl water' to 'water, tap, drinking, average values' as it is the least processed option available for water.
Matched '6 tbsp grated parmesan' to 'cheese, hard, parmesan, 32 % fidm.' as it is the least processed option available for parmesan cheese.
Matched '1 handful of mozzarella' to 'cheese, semihard, mozzarella, 30 % fidm.' as it is the least processed option available for mozzarella.
